name: Dyre
description:
Do you like jumping?

Who doesn't?

Try Dyre! Dyre is like chrome dino run, but in HD! Shaders, particles and nice game feel included! This game was made with Pygame and a bit of ModernGL. Thanks to Tank King and Ne_Mene for the help with shaders!

Dyre is the 2nd HD remake I made so far. Please leave feedback on what I can improve!
